lines: Mwathani niĩ nĩ mbataire, ũthambie gĩko gĩthire,
Na mwaki kana na maaĩ ũtherie biũ ũtherie biũ.
ũtherie biũ Mũhonokia, thĩinĩ na nja ngoro yothe,
Ona angĩkorũo no mwaki kinya ngũĩre mehia makwa.
Nĩ ndĩkenaga mũno ma, wanyonereria maũndũ,
No ũrĩa mbatairo nĩguo no ngoro, yakwa ĩthere.
Ngoro yakwa ĩtarĩ theru ndingĩhota gũkũũrana,
Roho waku we Mwathani, Theria rĩu, Thambia rĩu.
Ngeretie na hinya wothe gũtiga meciria moru,
Na ndingĩhota gũtiga nĩnemetwo nĩ gwĩtheria.
